text:
I have a column with ids and i want a new column that is the ordinalrank of those ids. I can achieve it like this, but i know there must be a 1-liner (right?)
```dd = DataFrame(a = [1 1 1 5 5 6 6 6 101 10 10 22 5 2 1][:])
tempd = Dict( a=>b for (a,b) in zip(unique(dd.a), ordinalrank(unique(dd.a))))
transform(dd, :a=>ByRow(x -> tempd[x])=>:idx)```

elements.text: I have a column with ids and i want a new column that is the ordinalrank of those ids. I can achieve it like this, but i know there must be a 1-liner (right?)

transform(dd, :a=>ByRow(x -> tempd[x])=>:idx)

text: sometimes i wish julia help had a “related functions” section like matlab
